article_title: Petrobras CEO Leaves Open the Possibility of Resignation
article_text:
RIO DE JANEIRO—The embattled chief executive of Brazilian state oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA left open the possibility of resigning amid a major corruption scandal and expressed concern that related investigations could compromise the company’s production goals.

Petrobras CEO Maria das Graças Silva Foster said Wednesday she had discussed stepping down on as many as three occasions with Brazilian President President Dilma Rousseff. Ms. Foster said the company’s auditors must determine that current Petrobras...
